__run_task_commands__: if [[ $(rpm -q mesa-va-drivers) == 'package mesa-va-drivers is not installed' ]];then sudo dnf install mesa-va-drivers-freeworld -y --best ;else sudo dnf swap mesa-va-drivers mesa-va-drivers-freeworld -y --best;fi

if [[ $(rpm -q mesa-vdpau-drivers) == 'package mesa-vdpau-drivers is not installed' ]];then sudo dnf install mesa-vdpau-drivers-freeworld -y --best ;else sudo dnf swap mesa-vdpau-drivers  mesa-vdpau-drivers-freeworld -y --best;fi
